lines.text: We will be arriving in a few moments now.
Why, why you wear such clothes like me?
Because I live in the jungle, just like you.
We're talking about life. You dismiss it as if it were nothing.
A choice between wildlife and progress? Which would you take?
Jai, you've got to understand that there are other people who love the elephants.
You want to stop them too?
Of course I do. Not the same way that you do. They're too strong for you.
No one is stronger than Kajendra.
Guns are stronger than Kajendra and guns will kill Kajendra.
Tarzan! You are not going away, Tarzan.
Jai, friends are always in each other's hearts. I'll be back someday.

[fighting back tears]
I won't cry. I am a man.
I have many friends who are elephants - but I don't own any of them.
